required.name: Albania
required.note: Except for passengers with a valid multiple entry visa issued by the USA, the UK, or a Schengen Member State.

required.name: Belarus
required.note:
Visas are issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport.
All visa support documents must be submitted to the Consular Division at Minsk (MSQ) in advance, at least 3 working days (for short-term visas) or 5 working days (for long-term visas) prior to arrival.

required.name: Belize
required.note: Except for holders of a valid multiple entry visa issued by the USA. Fee: USD 50.-.

required.name: Bhutan
required.note: Visas are obtainable on arrival for a max. stay of 15 days if application is sent by a tour operator to the Department of Tourism, at least 2 1/2 months in advance, and visa clearance is obtained.

required.name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
required.note: Except for passengers with a valid multiple entry visa, issued by Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Ireland, Monaco, Romania, the UK, or a Schengen Member State, and travelling from the country of issue. They are visa exempt for a max. stay of 7 days.

required.name: Burkina Faso
required.note: Holders of Peruvian passports can obtain a visa on arrival for a max. stay of 1 month, if holding a valid visa issued by a Schengen Member State. Single entry fee: XOF 47,000.-. Multiple entry fee: XOF 61,000.-.

required.name: Cuba
required.note: Tourist Cards grant a max. stay of 30 days to nationals of Peru.

required.name: El Salvador
required.note: Except for passengers with a valid visa issued by Canada, the USA, or a Schengen Member State.

required.name: The Gambia
required.note: Except for passengers travelling as tourists on a charter flight.

required.name: Serbia
required.note: Except for passengers with a valid visa issued by Switzerland, the USA or an EEA Member State for a max. stay of 90 days within 180 days. Extension possible.

required.name: Vietnam
required.note:
Pre-arranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Phu Quoc or Da Nang airports.
Phú Quốc without a visa for up to 30 days.

not-required.name: Antigua and Barbuda
not-required.note: The initial duration of stay for nationals of Peru is determined by the Immigration Officer on arrival. Extension possible.

not-required.name: Venezuela
not-required.note: 90 days. Extension of stay possible for additional 90 days.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: eVisa holders must arrive at Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: Myanmar
evisa.note: 28 days. eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports.

evisa.name: Sri Lanka
evisa.note: 30 days. Fees vary and must be paid in USD. Extension of stay possible for additional 150 days. May apply online.

on-arrival.name: Armenia
on-arrival.note: 120 days. Obtainable on arrival at Zvartnots International Airport. Fee: AMD 15,000.-, payable in local currency only. Extension possible.

on-arrival.name: Bahrain
on-arrival.note: 2 weeks. Fee: BHD 25.-. Extension of stay possible for additional 2 weeks. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Bangladesh
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Fee: Varies per country. Extension possible.

on-arrival.name: Burundi
on-arrival.note: 3 months. Obtainable on arrival at Bujumbura airport (BJM).

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Fee: USD 30.- for tourists; USD 35.- when traveling on business. Obtainable on arrival at Airport or main points of Border Crossing

on-arrival.name: Cape Verde
on-arrival.note: Fee: EUR 25.-.

on-arrival.name: Comoros
on-arrival.note: Fee: EUR 30.-, or USD 50.-.

on-arrival.name: Djibouti
on-arrival.note: Fee: Stays of max. 1 month: DJF 15,000.-, EUR 75.- or USD 90.-. Stays of more than 1 month: DJF 20,000.-, EUR 100.- or USD 120.-.

on-arrival.name: Egypt
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Fee: Single entry: USD 25.-. Multiple entry USD 35.-. Extension of stay possible.

on-arrival.name: Guinea-Bissau
on-arrival.note: 90 days. Fee: XOF 55,000.- or EUR 85.-.

on-arrival.name: Iran
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Fee: Between EUR 30.- and EUR 80.-. Extension of stay possible.

on-arrival.name: Jordan
on-arrival.note: Visa on arrival fees: JOD 40.- for stay of max. 2 months and single entry; JOD 60.- valid for 3 months and two entries; JOD 120.- valid for 6 months and multiple entries.

on-arrival.name: Kenya
on-arrival.note: 3 months. Fee: USD 50.-, also payable in EUR or GBP (cash only). Extension of stay possible for additional 3 months. May apply online.

on-arrival.name: Laos
on-arrival.note: 30 days

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendable for 2 additional months. Free of charge at Beirut International Airport, if there is no Israeli visa or stamp, holding a telephone number and address in Lebanon.

on-arrival.name: Madagascar
on-arrival.note: 90 days. Fee: Max. 30 days: MGA 80,000.-. Max. 60 days: MGA 100,000.-. Max. 90 days: MGA 140,000.- (or equivalent in EUR or USD).

on-arrival.name: Malawi
on-arrival.note: 30 days. They can apply to extend their stay for additional 60 days.

on-arrival.name: Maldives
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Extensions of stay possible up to a max. of 90 days, for a fee: MVR 750.-.

on-arrival.name: Marshall Islands
on-arrival.note: 90 days

on-arrival.name: Mauritania
on-arrival.note: Available at Nouakchott–Oumtounsy International Airport.

on-arrival.name: Mauritius
on-arrival.note: 60 days

on-arrival.name: Mozambique
on-arrival.note: 30 days via Beira (BEW), Nampula (APL), Maputo (MPM), Pemba (POL), Tete (TET) and Vilankulo (VNX) airports. Extension of further 30 days possible. Fee: USD 66.-.

on-arrival.name: Nepal
on-arrival.note: 90 days. Fee: Between USD 25.- and USD 100.- or equivalent in convertible currency.

on-arrival.name: Nicaragua
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Fee: USD 50.-.

on-arrival.name: Palau
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Free of charge. Extension possible for a fee: USD 50.-.

on-arrival.name: Papua New Guinea
on-arrival.note: 60 days via Port Moresby (POM) and Rabaul (RAB) airports. Fee: Varies from free of charge to PGK 500.-.

on-arrival.name: Saint Lucia
on-arrival.note: 6 weeks. Fee: USD 50.-.

on-arrival.name: Samoa
on-arrival.note: 60 days. Extension of stay possible.

on-arrival.name: Seychelles
on-arrival.note: 3 months. Free of charge. Extensions possible for further periods of 3 months, up to a max. stay of 12 months. Fee: SCR 5,000.- per extension.

on-arrival.name: Solomon Islands
on-arrival.note: 3 months

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival. Fee: USD 50.-. Extension of stay possible for additional 30 days.

on-arrival.name: Suriname
on-arrival.note: 90 days. Obtainable on arrival at Paramaribo International Airport (PBM). Fee: USD 35.- for a single entry.

on-arrival.name: Tanzania
on-arrival.note: Fee: Between USD 50.- and USD 100.- (cash only). The fee can only be paid with notes of USD 50.- or USD 100.-.

on-arrival.name: East Timor
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Fee: USD 30.- (payable in USD only).

on-arrival.name: Togo
on-arrival.note: 7 days. Extension of stay possible for additional 90 days. Fee: Vary between XOF 10,000.- and XOF 90,000.- depending on duration of stay.

on-arrival.name: Tuvalu
on-arrival.note: 1 month

on-arrival.name: Uganda
on-arrival.note: Fee: USD 100.-.

on-arrival.name: Zambia
on-arrival.note: 90 days within 1 year. Fee: USD 50.- (single entry) and USD 80.- (multiple entry).
